DOC.brief_summary: Safety and efficacy of recombinant birch pollen allergen in the treatment of allergic rhinoconjunctivitis
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Recombinant Birch Pollen Allergen in the Treatment of Allergic Rhinoconjunctivitis
